alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 16 at 12:26PM EST until December 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Richmond (Staten Island), Kings (Brooklyn) and Southern Queens Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT KILLS HARBOR AT GREAT KILLS NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.2 FT, MAJOR 9.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/12 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.6/ 2.1 2.9/ 3.5 2 MINOR 17/01 AM 5.2/ 5.7 -0.2/ 0.3 1.2/ 1.7 2 NONE 17/02 PM 4.2/ 4.7 -1.1/-0.7 0.2/ 0.7 2 NONE 18/03 AM 5.1/ 5.6 -0.3/ 0.2 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
